name: Slicing Savant
description:
A solo developed single player VR game where you use a variety of sword types to slice many different objects that come flying at you, while navigating the difficulties that the environment of the levels presents.

Available only for Oculus for now.

This is an early access version! Check out my YouTube channel to follow development: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpD3OFMpFOoSq6ezf53RVbA

So far the game contains:

-A menu where there is an interactive an innovative area to alter settings such as turning dials on the speakers to change sound volumes. 

-Tutorial and practice options in the menu.

-A single intricately crafted level with a garbage facility theme. In this level you walk over a giant pit by staying on a tin walkway of planks while objects are thrown at you from a garbage bin that is moving along a conveyor belt. 

-There is a lot going on at once while playing this level, and it takes some skill to master, so don't expect to be good right away.

-Expect much more to come. Including more platforms to play on, more levels, gameplay balancing, more swords and sliceable objects, etc...
